direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve product positions but for different types (locked vs. flexible).
Both methods involve querying product lists with similar parameter handling and control flow.
Both methods modify the state of locked products, though in different ways (query vs. action).
Both methods access and retrieve records related to locked products.
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to locked product operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for API requests.
Environment setup is required before querying locked product positions.
Both methods verify locked product positions and handle similar exceptions.
